original_title: ベロキス中毒レズビアン Vol.3 ～唾液たっぷり濃縮ver.～
overview: Renewal of the true value of lesbians! This work focuses on "Belokiss" that entangles tongues, sticking to "kiss" which is regarded as important in lesbian works. This time, I tried to make a rich saliva enriched ver. Even if you lick your lips, lick your teeth, and of course, even if you trace the front and back of your tongue, a large amount of sparkling saliva will spill out! See-through clothes, wet pubic hair. Please enjoy the mysteriously disturbed homosexuality with secretions like aphrodisiacs.
title: Addicted To Sloppy Kisses Lesbian Series Vol.3 Lots Of Highly Concentrated Slurping Drool Vol.3
